str2: David, King of Israel. Of Hebrew origin; Dabid, the Israelite king.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: From pro and horao; to behold in advance, i.e. to notice previously, or to keep in view.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Neuter of a compound of en and a derivative of optanomai; in the face of.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
On the right hand, right hand, right. From dechomai; the right side or hand.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: From salos; to waver, i.e. Agitate, rock, topple or destroy; figuratively, to disturb, incite.
